about_the_game:
An epic poem in a lengthy 'Open World'

Enjoy endless adventures and journeys through a continent that reaches about 35 ㎢ square, many dungeons hidden in it, and a myriad of generated instant dungeons.


'Accessibility' added to the battle armed with strategy and 'taste of the hand'

Add defense, avoidance, defensiveness, and repulsion to the close-range, long-range combat methods according to your four jobs, making it easy to work with teams to achieve infinite combo attacks.


fun to farm and strengthen numerous equipment

Find 300 kinds of equipment and dozens of set items related to four jobs and strengthen them in various ways to set up your own equipment.


Sometimes annihilate enemies alone, sometimes together

A battle that's hard to solve alone can work together up to eight people to exchange equipment and strategize to solve the quest for an ongoing story.


My character who grew up so hard determines the superiority and inferiority

In addition to the main story in the game, we are preparing for a large RvR battle where we can engage a large number of users in addition to PvP, which is a 4 vs 4 slaughter in a limited Dungeon.

name: Pure Blood

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770 / AMD FX8300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 2080 Ti VRAM 8G / Radeon RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Window 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-7700 / AMD Ryzen5 2400G
  • Graphics: Geforce RTX 3080 VRAM 8G / Radeon RX 6800 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: "Pure Blood" is an Open World MORPG that tells the story of those who had to flee the invaded kingdom to find their throne again, and you can feel the "taste of hand" of Soul-Like through easy manipulation.
